attributes.description:
USED KIA SPORTAGE 2.0 CRDI EX A/T 2017 FOR SALE AT KIA CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

2 Year Warranty & Service Plans Available.
FEATURES Include: Dual Front, Side & Curtain Airbags, Aircon, 17" Alloy Wheels, Auto Headlights & Wipers, Keyless Entry/Start Central Locking, Cruise Control, Electric Mirrors & Windows, Fog Lights, Leather Interior, Multi-function steering, Front & Rear PDC, Tow Bar, Radio/CD/Mp3 player with Aux & USB port, Bluetooth.


Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
